title: Daily Life in Medieval Times
description: Divided into three Life in a Medieval castle; Life in a Medieval Village; Life in a Medieval City. Chapters include The Castle as a House, Hunting as a Way of Life, The Village Emerges, The Villagers; How They Lived, Village Justice, A Medieval Housewife, Weddings and Funerals, The Doctor, Town Government, and many more interesting facets of Medieval life.
author: Frances Gies
